description: Workout timer & counter which is simple, practical and classy.Whether it's interval training, yoga, home workouts, sports, strength training, circuits, HIIT or other fitness requirements, this app can easily fit in and accelerate your progress. Time your repetitions, forget the count and focus on your moves.A must-have countdown timer app for exercise enthusiasts, athletes, trainers, coaches and all the fitness freaks who are passionate about exercising.Features:• Timer + Counter combined together (icount timer)• Save timers/counters as presets organised by activities• Large clear display with progress bar• Audio cues• Smart lock to lock timer screen• Android wear app+ Presets from the handheld app are available for you on Android Wear organised by activities.+ Get vibration alerts on your Android Wear during start/rest of intervals.+ Supports ambient mode which saves battery+ Note: Android Wear app requires paired device to runThis is an ad-supported free version of iCountTimer with basic features. Do check the Pro version for more features.Pro version features:• No Ads• Extended slider limits: interval up to 30 seconds and rounds up to 40• Input custom seconds / counts and repeat interval (rounds)• Save upto 40 presets• 5 different themes• Landscape mode• Various choices for alert sounds such as boxing bell etc• Different counting modes• Custom start delay• Calories estimation**• Google Fit integration** The estimated calories are approximate Calories burned for any selected activity based on the MET (Metabolic Equivalent) values for the activity and personal details of individual. Actual energy expenditure may vary.
descriptionHTML:
Workout timer & counter which is simple, practical and classy.

Whether it's interval training, yoga, home workouts, sports, strength training, circuits, HIIT or other fitness requirements, this app can easily fit in and accelerate your progress. Time your repetitions, forget the count and focus on your moves.

A must-have countdown timer app for exercise enthusiasts, athletes, trainers, coaches and all the fitness freaks who are passionate about exercising.


Features:

• Timer + Counter combined together (icount timer)
• Save timers/counters as presets organised by activities
• Large clear display with progress bar
• Audio cues
• Smart lock to lock timer screen

• Android wear app
+ Presets from the handheld app are available for you on Android Wear organised by activities.
+ Get vibration alerts on your Android Wear during start/rest of intervals.
+ Supports ambient mode which saves battery
+ Note: Android Wear app requires paired device to run


This is an ad-supported free version of iCountTimer with basic features. Do check the Pro version for more features.

Pro version features:

• No Ads
• Extended slider limits: interval up to 30 seconds and rounds up to 40
• Input custom seconds / counts and repeat interval (rounds)
• Save upto 40 presets
• 5 different themes
• Landscape mode
• Various choices for alert sounds such as boxing bell etc
• Different counting modes
• Custom start delay
• Calories estimation**
• Google Fit integration

** The estimated calories are approximate Calories burned for any selected activity based on the MET (Metabolic Equivalent) values for the activity and personal details of individual. Actual energy expenditure may vary.
comments: Thanks for your helpful response. I need to think about what you wrote, but in the meantime I wanted to add two more stars for you.  Original review: Can't trust latest update. Author claims just UI tweaks, but the app is now requesting access to identity info and photos/media files. Please disclose why you suddenly need access to all of that info.
Very useful But not the most polished or user friendly
Great HIIT counter for Wear intergration Great timer and app easy to use. Wish that I could make different length timers in the same preset instead of just one time length for all rounds.
Great app Love it, just wish I could save more presets without paying
Great app Do my intense cycles here. Very useful

Great app! But I have one suggestion This app is great, but I would recommend that a timer in between sets be added. I use it for hangboarding, and being able to time out a 3 min. rest between sets of grips.
